#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int convert(float a)
{
    if(float(a)==int(a))
    {
        return a;
    }
    else return int(a)+1;
}
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    int x,y,z,i; float w;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>x>>y>>z;
        w=(float(x-y)/float(y))*z;

        cout<<convert(w)<<endl;
    }
return 0;
}
